name: Lost Library
description: A vast repository of ancient knowledge contains books, scrolls, and magical texts from forgotten civilizations. The priceless knowledge attracts scholars and mages, while the magical protections and dangerous guardians prevent unauthorized access to powerful secrets.
atmosphere: Endless shelves of ancient books and scrolls stretch into darkness like maze of knowledge. Air thick with old parchment, ink, and forgotten wisdom dust scent. Fingertips trace spines of books containing world-changing secrets. Skin tingles with presence of magical protections. Taste of ancient knowledge and forbidden power fills mouth. Weight of countless secrets and dangerous guardians presses down on you.
